00017 #define DEBUG_MESSAGES_ON
00018 // Change this to ASSERTIONS_OFF to turn them off
00019 #define ASSERTIONS_ON
00020 
00021 /***************************************
00022 * Assertion Macros
00023 ***************************************/
00024 #ifdef ASSERTIONS_ON
00025 /* Asserts the condition, and terminates the program if false.
00026 * @param X The boolean condition statement to test.
00027 * @pre X must be an expression which can evaluate to true or false. ASSERTIONS_ON must be defined.
00028 * @post Program execution will terminate if the condition X is false.
00029 * The condition, the filename, and the line number will be printed before exiting.
00030 */
00031 #define fatalAssert( X ) if( !( X ) ) { std::cout << "Fatal assertion failed: " << #X << ", File: " << __FILE__ << ", Line: " << __LINE__ << std::endl; exit( -1 ); }
00032 /* Asserts the condition, but does not terminate the program if false.
00033 * @param X The boolean condition statement to test.
00034 * @pre X must be an expression which can evaluate to true or false. ASSERTIONS_ON must be defined.
00035 * @post If the condition X is false, the condition, the filename, and the line number will be printed.
00036 */
00037 #define softAssert( X ) if( !( X ) ) { std::cout << "Soft assertion failed: " << #X << ", File: " << __FILE__ << ", Line: " << __LINE__ << std::endl; }
00038 /* A fatal assert that always occurs if executed.
00039 * @pre ASSERTIONS_ON must be defined.
00040 * @post Program execution will terminate; the filename, and line number will be printed before exiting.
00041 */
00042 #define alwaysAssert() { std::cout << "Always assert here: " << "File: " << __FILE__ << ", Line: " << __LINE__ << std::endl; exit( -1 ); }
00043 #else
00044 #define fatalAssert( X ) {}
00045 #define softAssert( X ) {}
00046 #define alwaysAssert() {}
00047 #endif
